Posts.Content: Please, please is anybody else suffering overwhelming fatigue. I was diagnosed with stage 2 grade 3 her2+ Er- breast cancer August 2017. i had a masectomy and reconstruction in September then chemo until March 2018, then Lymph node clearance (2 posptive lymph nodes) then radiotherapy. I'm now on Herceptin and pertuzumab every three weeks but i'm chronically fatigued. is this normal?
Posts.Title: herceptin and Pertuzumab
